The plot of " Hitch " is based on a classic misunderstanding. The film follows two friends, Tom (Freeman) and Jerry (Ferguson), who have been friends for many years.

However, their friendship comes to an end when Tom receives a mysterious phone call that changes his life forever.

As Tom investigates the origins of the mysterious phone call, he discovers shocking secrets about his past relationships, as well as the mysterious origins of the mysterious phone call itself.
